summary: The diff implements all five requirements (REQ-26 through REQ-30). The core hook (useLivePrice), utility function (getLivePrice), LivePriceTicker component, LivePriceChart component, and integrations into StockPlaygroundPage and PortfolioAnalyzerPage are all present. However, there is one notable gap: the useLivePrice hook is placed in frontend/src/hooks/useLivePrice.ts rather than in frontend/src/data/mockStocks.ts as specified in REQ-26. The getLivePrice function appears to be added to mockStocks.ts, but the hook itself is extracted to a separate file. Additionally, the useLivePrice hook returns extra fields beyond what was specified.

missing_requirements.requirement: Export the useLivePrice hook from frontend/src/data/mockStocks.ts (not a separate hooks file).
missing_requirements.reason: The spec explicitly states to export the useLivePrice hook from frontend/src/data/mockStocks.ts, but the diff places the hook in frontend/src/hooks/useLivePrice.ts instead.

hallucinated_features.description: The useLivePrice hook returns additional fields sessionOpenPrice and absoluteChange beyond the specified interface of price, previousPrice, changePercent, and isUp.
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-26 specifies the hook returns only price, previousPrice, changePercent, and isUp. The implementation adds sessionOpenPrice and absoluteChange which were not requested.

hallucinated_features.description: LivePriceTicker accepts a compact prop rendering a condensed inline variant.
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-27 does not specify a compact mode or alternate rendering variant for the LivePriceTicker component.

hallucinated_features.description: LivePriceChart accepts a configurable height prop.
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-28 does not mention a configurable height prop for the LivePriceChart component.
